text: D Neppa id Isrusun aman seg igenni. Nessuffu$ ed yissen yal im$an. Nessuffu$ ed yissen tizzegzewt. Nessuffu$ ed yissen iaaqqayen mbabben, iguza n ppmeo id ipuubbun si tezdayin, leonanat n tfeooant, uzemmur, n oemman, ppemcabin ne$ ur ppemcabin. Walit ppemoa nnsen mi d teffe$ tebbwa. Ih, deg waya, war ccekk, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
